p: The genus Chiliadenus Cass. belongs to the Asteraceae family. This genus is composed of at least ten endemic species of certain areas of the Mediterranean region. In Spain lives a single species of this genus, Chiliadenus glutinosus (L.) Fourr., whose distribution in the Eastern Spanish mainland also extends through the island of Mallorca, southern France, and northern Morocco [ 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6].
